Title: Coat Check
Writer: Lucia Aniello, Paul W. Downs, Naomi Ekperigin (staff writer), Ilana Glazer (created by), Abbi Jacobson (created by), Anthony King (staff writer)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Kelly Ripa, Alia Shawkat
Plot: Abbi is determined to return a lost coat; Ilana explores a new romance that feels oddly familiar.
